data.title: Top Oracle CRM Implementation Partner in Malaysia, Singapore, Australia.
data.meta_description: VTC is the leading Oracle Customer Relationship Management software integration provider with certified consultants providing best pricing of oracle, netsuite consulting services in Asia Pacific region, including Malaysia, Singapore, Australia and more.
data.text:
What does Oracle do?

Oracle Corporation, a global leader in computer technology, extends a comprehensive suite of software, cloud solutions, and hardware products. Renowned for their widely adopted relational database management systems, notably Oracle Database, enterprises rely on their capabilities for efficient data management. Oracle specializes in diverse enterprise software solutions, encompassing customer relationship management (CRM), enterprise resource planning (ERP), human capital management (HCM), and beyond. Furthermore, Oracle is a key player in cloud services, offering Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS) to cater to varied business needs.
